title: 50 Companies to Watch in 2021
itunes:title: 50 Companies to Watch in 2021
description:
Dr. Ian Lustbader, Clinical Professor of Medicine at NYU Langone, provides a coronavirus and vaccine update. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber talks about 50 Companies to Watch in 2021. And we Drive to the Close with Bill Smead, CEO at Smead Capital Management.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
